```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(raster)
library(sf)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)

source(here("comparing_individual_layers","change_functions.R"))
```

```{r}
year<- 2001
arid1 <- raster(here("combine_layers",
                                   "sb_matched_layers_timeseries",
                                   "aridity",
                                   paste("sb_arid_match_",year,".tif",sep="")))

year<- 2008
arid8 <- raster(here("combine_layers",
                                   "sb_matched_layers_timeseries",
                                   "aridity",
                                   paste("sb_arid_match_",year,".tif",sep="")))
year<-2019
arid19 <- raster(here("combine_layers",
                                   "sb_matched_layers_timeseries",
                                   "aridity",
                                   paste("sb_arid_match_",year,".tif",sep="")))
rm(year)

#plot(arid1)
#plot(arid8)
#plot(arid19)
```


```{r}
mtx_arid_8_19 <-change_mtx(arid8, arid19)
df_arid_8_19 <-change_df(mtx_arid_8_19,keep_equals = TRUE)

mtx_arid_1_19 <-change_mtx(arid1, arid19)
df_arid_1_19 <-change_df(mtx_arid_1_19,keep_equals = TRUE)

mtx_arid_1_8 <-change_mtx(arid1, arid8)
df_arid_1_8 <-change_df(mtx_arid_1_8,keep_equals = TRUE)

mtx_arid_8_19
mtx_arid_1_19
mtx_arid_1_8
```
